snippet.title: Virtual Artist Hatsune Miku is the Festival Season 7 Icon!
snippet.description:
Mikufans, it’s time to grab your glowsticks. Hatsune Miku (初音ミク), one of the biggest virtual pop stars in the world, is bringing her futuristic sounds to Fortnite as the Icon for Festival Season 7!

Miku - Anamanaguchi, Hatsune Miku

Follow Fortnite Festival on social media:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/fnfestival
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@fnfestival
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fnfestival
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fnfestival
